name: Bucky Saves the Day
description:
*DISCLAIMER* 

Unfortunately we didn't manage to fully finish this game, better luck next year ;)

You are little guide dog named Buky! Your owner is in danger, he lost his cane so you have to guide him to the cane market to buy a new one!
Save him fron the dangers of the city and be carefull... don't get distracted!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Bark

This game was made for the Game Maker's ToolKit Game Jam 2020 by:

Riccardo Stincone - Programming

Giorgia Zenere - Art

Chiara Mazzini - Art/Animation

Leonardo Tacconella - Art/Animation

Special thanks to:

Paolo Avilio 

Andrija Klaric - Music
